articles.title: South Side's Violation of Inter-Korean Agreement Censured
articles.content:
South Side's Violation of Inter-Korean Agreement Censured
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- North-south military working-level talks took place in the area of the south side in Panmunjom on Thursday in connection with the evermore undisguised violation of the north-south military agreement by the south Korean puppet military. 
					 The talks were attended by the north side's delegation headed by Senior Colonel of the Korean People's Army Pak Rim Su.
					
					 At the talks the north side strongly accused the south Korean puppet military of desperately persisting in scattering leaflets into areas of the north in violation of the bilateral agreement. 
					
					  Citing facts to prove that recently the puppet military has massively scattered leaflets into the areas along the Military Demarcation Line (MDL) including Kangwon and North and South Hwanghae provinces and even into the heart of Kaesong City and its nearby ris, to say nothing of the Kaesong Industrial Zone (KIZ) and Mt. Kumgang tourist area and areas around it, the north side stressed that these violations have assumed a more serious dimension than before. 
					
					 Declaring that it is the height of folly for the south side to shake through the despicable act of scattering leaflets the faith and will of the army and people in the north who consider their leader and country as dearer than their own lives, the north side stated that such mean psychological warfare against the DPRK would only sharply heighten the hatred of the servicepersons and people in the north. 
					
					 The gravity of the scattering of leaflets by the puppet military lies in that it is a crude violation of the military agreement between both sides and a challenge to the north side and it is an act of further deteriorating the present strained inter-Korean relations and its danger lies in that it may spark off new military clashes, the north side stated. 
					
					 In view of the serious situation, the north side strongly urged the puppet military to immediately stop the above-said act, make an official apology for it and severely punish the main culprits and organizations responsible for it and take thorough responsible measures against the recurrence of such act as called for by the military agreement between both sides. 
					
					 At the talks the south side tried to evade the blame at any cost, talking about what it called "internal situation" and "peculiarities of its system" instead of admitting and apologizing for its anti-DPRK psychological warfare. But, finding it hard to seek a way out in face of the north's perfectly logical assertion and evidence, the south side had no option but to say it would look into the case and take relevant measures after going back. 
					
					 The north side strongly warned the south side as follows: If the puppet military persists in scattering leaflets in the future, too,  firstly it will seriously affect all the inter-Korean cooperation undertakings in the KIZ and tour of Kaesong now under way, secondly, it will make it impossible for the personnel of the south side to properly pass through the MDL and thirdly, it will make it impossible for the personnel of the south side now staying in the KIZ and Mt. Kumgang tourist area to remain there any longer.

articles.title: Anniversary of Publication of October 4 Declaration Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Publication of October 4 Declaration Observed
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- A seminar took place here on Thursday to mark the first anniversary of the publication of the historic October 4 declaration.
					 Present there were Kim Yong Dae, chairman of the Central Committee of the Korean Social Democratic Party, Ryu Mi Yong, chairperson of the Central Committee of the Korean Chondoist Chongu Party, Kim Wan Su, director of the Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of the Fatherland, leading officials of public organizations, officials concerned and working people in Pyongyang. 
					
					 Speeches were made by Kim Yong Dae, Thae Hyong Chol, president of the Academy of Social Sciences, An Kyong Ho, director of the Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of the Fatherland, Ri Jong Hyok, director of the National Reunification Institute, and Ro Song Sil, chairperson of the Central Committee of the Korean Democratic Women's Union.
					
					 Speakers said that the adoption and publication of the "Declaration for Development of the North-South Relations and Peace and Prosperity" in October last year provided a firm guarantee for more energetically advancing the June 15 era of reunification, adding that the declaration absolutely supported and approved by the public at home and abroad was a shining embodiment and precious fruition of the outstanding idea and leadership of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 They explained and proved that the said declaration is a practical common document as it indicates a true way of upholding and embodying the idea of "By our nation itself" enshrined in the June 15 joint declaration and a banner putting strong impetus to the independent development and reunification of the nation.
					
					 The declaration serves as highly important guidelines for bringing about a new phase in developing the inter-Korean relations and achieving national reunification as it indicates overall practical ways and measures for adhering to the June 15 joint declaration and positively embodying it and boosting those relations in the direction of reunification on the basis of mutual respect and confidence. 
					
					 Explaining that the October 4 declaration is a peace declaration which calls for putting an end to the military hostile relations between the north and the south, defusing tension and ensuring peace on the Korean Peninsula, they referred to measures for implementing it.
					
					 They underscored the need for all Koreans to turn out in the struggle to implement the above-said declarations under the uplifted banner of Songun and thus shatter the moves of the separatist forces at home and abroad and accomplish the historic cause of national reunification through their concerted efforts.

articles.title: National Exhibition and Public Presentation of Essential Food Held
articles.content:
National Exhibition and Public Presentation of Essential Food Held
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- A national exhibition and public presentation of essential food took place at the Grand People's Study House from Sept. 30 to Oct. 2.
					 They brought together officials, scientists and technicians in the field of the production of essential food from across the country.
					
					 Introduced at the exhibition and public presentation were more than 200 scientific and technological achievements and experience gained in the researches conducted to improve the quality of soy and bean paste.
					
					 Highly appreciated by the participants were scientific research successes and data obtained in increasing the varieties of essential food and improving their quality including the industrialization of the production of fermented soybeans and fermented soybean paste, Korean soy and bean paste production through the cultivation of micro-organism mixture and bean paste production and experience gained in updating various essential food production processes such as computer-aided system for the process of producing fermented soy and the production of soy and bean paste on the basis of IT.
					
					 The events also involved lectures on new technology and video shows helpful to solving scientific and technological issues arising in turning out quality soy and bean paste including the standardization of their production and unification of their standards, etc. and exchanges and consultations aimed at introducing advanced technology and methods of producing soy and bean paste, etc.

articles.title: Etude Fine Art Exhibition under Way
articles.content:
Etude Fine Art Exhibition under Way
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- A field etude fine art exhibition is going on at the Taehongdan County Cultural Hall to mark the 10th anniversary of the publication of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's famous work "On Bringing about a Signal Turn in Potato Farming."
					 Displayed in the venue of the exhibition are more than 70 etude art works of various kinds such as Korean painting, oil painting, water-color painting and calligraphy done by artists in Pyongyang and in local areas, while witnessing the stirring reality of Taehongdan County whose appearance has changed beyond recognition under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Works including Korean painting "Joy at successful research into a new species," oil painting "Vast expanse of fields under potato flowers at foot of Mt. Paektu," water-color painting "View of potato processing in Taehongdan," calligraphy "Potatoes streaming out from the belt conveyer, scenery of the Songun era" truthfully depict officials and other working people in the county taking the lead in implementing the WPK's policy on bringing about a signal turn in potato farming. 
					
					 Works such as oil painting "View of street in Taehongdan Township," water-color painting "View of the Hongam Farm" and calligraphy "Radical change" successfully portray the county which has turned into a place good to work and live in.

articles.title: Independence Day of Nigeria Observed
articles.content:
Independence Day of Nigeria Observed
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- Nigerian Ambassador to the DPRK Yusuf Amuda Abubakar hosted a reception on Wednesday to mark the 48th independence day of his country.
					 Present there on invitation were DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun, acting Chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries Mun Jae Chol, Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Kim Hyong Jun, Vice-Minister of Foreign Trade Ri Myong San and officials concerned and diplomatic envoys of different countries here. Staff members of the Nigerian embassy were on hand.
					
					 The ambassador said in his speech that Nigeria and the DPRK have long maintained the bilateral relations of friendship, supporting and cooperating with each other.
					
					 Noting that the historic Pyongyang summit took place in June, 2000 and the June 15 joint declaration was adopted there, he hoped that Korea's reunification would be achieved on the basis of this declaration.
					
					 Pak Ui Chun said in his speech that the DPRK and Nigeria as non-aligned nations have long supported and cooperated with each other.
					
					 He expressed the will to strive to boost the bilateral relations in various fields in the future, too.

articles.title: DPRK Women Volleyball Players Win Title of Tournament
articles.content:
DPRK Women Volleyball Players Win Title of Tournament
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- Players of the DPRK came first in the 5th VTV Cup International Women's Volleyball Tournament.
					 The tournament held in Vietnam in September brought together volleyball teams of the DPRK, Vietnam, Thailand, Kazakhstan, Australia and New Zealand.
					
					 The four teams that proved successful in league matches played knock-out matches.
					
					 The DPRK team trounced the teams of Vietnam, Thailand and Australia 3-0 and the team of New Zealand 3-1 in league matches and snubbed the team of Vietnam 3-1 in the semi-finals before advancing to the finals.
					
					 The DPRK players beat the team of Kazakhstan 3-1 in the finals.
					
					 Player Min Ok Ju was awarded the prize for the best organizer and the prize for the best server and player Kim Ok Hui the prize for the best free defender.

articles.title: Osudok, a Macrobian Village
articles.content:
Osudok, a Macrobian Village
Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- There is Osudok village in Junggang County, Jagang Province, DPRK.
					Long-livers keep increasing in the village which has turned into a macrobian village from a village of short-livers.
					
					Persons over sixty could hardly be found in the village before the liberation of the country.
					
					In the village called "village nearest to the sky" and "barren land," people died of endemics in groups by drinking standing water. The villagers, old and young, walked with the help of sticks with gnarls cropping up at the joints of their limbs.
					
					Osudok, once a village of short-livers with a shadow of death hanging over it, has turned into a village of longevity in health good to live in. There is a moving story about this.
					
					President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il visited Osudok in person in September Juche 53 (1964).
					
					The President said the villagers must not drink filthy water in this happy land.  Determined to put a period of the painful history of Osudok, he said firmly that clean water must be drawn to the village, though it was situated in a rather high place. And he saw to it that the living conditions of the villagers were discussed at a cabinet meeting and took necessary measures to completely eliminate the endemics which had tormented the villagers for a long time.
					
					Under his loving care, the water of River Amnok was carried to Osudok more than 800 meters above the sea level through multi-stage pumping stations.
					
					In the later period, Kim Jong Il, who inherited the President's love for the people, took care that modern dwelling houses were built and that a preventive hospital with well-qualified doctors was set up for the Osudok villagers. He also took measures to send lots of foodstuffs, medicines and first-aid ambulances to the village.
					
					Backed by this legend of human love, Osudok has turned into a place where a new history of longevity in good health is flowing.

articles.title: Tanchonmanjisong, Natural Treasure
articles.content:
Tanchonmanjisong, Natural Treasure
Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- Tanchonmanjisong is a natural treasure in Taljon-ri, Tanchon City, South Hamgyong Province.
					This tree is the tallest and most beautiful among the manjisongs (pine tree with abundant branches) growing in Korea.
					
					It is 10.5 meters high, 3.4 meters in bottom girth and 10.5 meters in the diameter of the crown. 
					
					At the height of 0.85 meters it shoots out several branches upward, which spread a good many branches to present a wonderful shape of a mushroom.
					
					The tree stands alone on the slope of a mountain, accentuating its peculiar shape.
					
					The tree adding to natural beauty is significant in academic researches.

articles.title: Letters Highly Praising Three Generals of Mt. Paektu
articles.content:
Letters Highly Praising Three Generals of Mt. Paektu
Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The Korean people's boundless praises to the three generals of Mt. Paektu can be seen in letters engraved on natural rocks.
					Already in the days of the anti-Japanese armed struggle, Korean revolutionaries engraved the slogan "Twenty million compatriots, when the motherland is liberated, let's convey the feats of General Kim from generation to generation by erecting here a monument cut with gold and jade axes" on a natural rock in Ryonggye-ri, Kyongwon County, North Hamgyong Province, to sow the seed of reverence to President Kim Il Sung in the people's minds.
					
					The slogan "Long live Comrade Kim Il Sung!" and the immortal revolutionary song of praise "Song of General Kim Il Sung" engraved on a natural rock of Mt. Suyang, the slogan "The great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung will always be with us" engraved on a natural rock by the Yuson Falls in Mt. Myohyang, the immortal classical masterpiece "On an Autumn Day in Mt. Myohyang" engraved on a rock under the Inhodae of Mt. Myohyang and so on impressively show the faith and will of the Korean people to  follow the President, always holding him in high esteem.
					
					The tradition of loyalty of the revolutionary forerunners following the President, holding him in high esteem, has generated the sentiment of trust in General Secretary Kim Jong Il, succeeded like a never shaking hard rock.
					
					After the letters "Jong Il Peak" were engraved on the sacred peak behind the secret camp in Mt. Paektu in November Juche 77 (1988), the letters "Kim Jong Il, Glory of Korea and Pride of the Nation" were engraved on the Oson Peak of picturesque Mt. Kumgang, "Kim Jong Il, Iron-willed Brilliant Commander" on the rock above the Murung Falls in Manphok Ravine of Mt. Myohyang and the slogan "Long live the great Songun policy!" on the Maebong Rock of Mt. Suyang.
					
					The letters "Kim Jong Suk, Anti-Japanese Woman General" and "General Kim Jong Suk, Anti-Japanese Woman Hero" were engraved on the rock of Kukji peak of Lagoon Samil of Mt. Kumgang and a rock in Pansok-ri,  Cholwon County.
					
					Besides, letters praising the feats of the three generals of Mt. Paektu were engraved on rocks in different places of the country including the Oksoe Rock in Phyongji-ri, Maengsan County, the rock of Ryanggak Peak of Mt. Kuwol and the rock of Mangsu Peak in Mt. Kumgang, which are national treasures to be conveyed down through generations.

articles.title: All Koreans Called upon to Hold Higher Banner of National Independence
articles.content:
All Koreans Called upon to Hold Higher Banner of National Independence
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- It is the unanimous desire of all Koreans and the fundamental requirement of the June 15 era of reunification to solve the issue of the nation, the issue of the country's reunification independently by their concerted efforts while opposing all interference of outsiders in it, says Rodong Sinmun Thursday in a signed article.
					 National independence is a basis for settling the issue of the nation and a life and soul of the movement for national reunification, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The Koreans keenly realized through their distress-torn history how miserable the destiny of a nation without sovereignty was.
					
					 The reality of the movement for national reunification requires all Koreans to hold higher the banner of national independence.
					
					 The U.S. is creating atmosphere obstructive to the implementation of the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration by escalating confrontation and tension on the Korean Peninsula, displeased with the implementation of those north-south declarations. 
					
					 At the instigation of the U.S. the Lee Myung Bak group in south Korea are standing against the implementation of the north-south declarations supported by all Koreans while slandering them. They are also indiscriminately suppressing pro-reunification patriotic organizations and people on charges of violation of the "National Security Law", thus checking their free movement for reunification.
					
					 Now that outsiders and the anti-reunification forces in south Korea have become all the more undisguised in their moves to block national harmony and reunification and foster and escalate the north-south confrontation it is necessary for the Korean nation to steadfastly maintain independence while regarding it as its life and soul in order to achieve the cause of national reunification and pave a wide avenue for development and prosperity.
					
					 History and reality clearly prove that the issue of the country's reunification should be solved by the concerted efforts of the Koreans on the principle of national independence under any circumstances.
					
					 To fully support the idea of "By our nation itself", a product of the spirit of national independence, and live and struggle as required by it would mean genuine patriotism in the June 15 era of reunification, concludes the article.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Foolish Maneuver Flayed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Foolish Maneuver Flayed
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The moves of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors to escalate confrontation with compatriots, backed by the U.S. are nothing but desperate efforts to escape the fate of tiger moths, observes Minju Joson today in a signed commentary. 
					 It goes on: 
					
					 The Lee group has become frantic in its efforts to attack the north by force of arms in league with the U.S. This is clearly evidenced by the recent "firepower demonstration" staged by the group in Phochon, Kyonggi Province. 
					
					It was an adventurous play with fire aimed at invading the north. This kind of saber rattling was conceived by the "Yusin" dictator, an ancestor of the Grand National Party of south Korea. 
					
					 By taking the operational plan for the above-said saber rattling out of the dustbin of history the puppet forces sought to get on the nerves of the People's Army and people of the DPRK and bedevil the inter-Korean relations. 
					
					 The above-said demonstration goes to substantially prove that the "dialogue", "confidence" and "sincerity" touted by Lee Myung Bak are no more than political chicanery intended to win popularity. Explicitly speaking, the above-said words on the lips of traitor Lee are nothing but an empty talk intended to evade the responsibility for having driven the inter-Korean relations to the lowest ebb and divert elsewhere the bitter criticism of him. His ulterior motive is to attack compatriots by force of arms. Lee is despicable human scum whom no one can trust or deal with as he has talked a lot about "dialogue", "confidence" and "sincerity" as a double dealer. 
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group had better behave itself, mindful that sycophancy towards the U.S. and the confrontation with fellow countrymen only precipitate its own self-destruction.

articles.title: Suppression of Pro-Reunification Organization Flayed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Suppression of Pro-Reunification Organization Flayed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration in south Korea released a statement on September 27 in denunciation of the puppet authorities' anachronistic suppression of the solidarity under the pretext of "security." 
					 The statement accused the puppet intelligence service and police of searching offices of the solidarity and its regional branches and arresting its Executive Chairman Choe Han Uk and other leading members of the organization on the same day on charges of violation of the "National Security Law."
					
					 Such repressive campaign is nothing but a foolish attempt to deliberately create a new terror-ridden atmosphere under the pretext of "security" on the strength of the NSL in a bid to put down the candlelight actions and tide over the crisis, it noted, and continued: 
					
					 The crackdown upon the righteous organization, which has worked for the implementation of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, reveals the Lee Myung Bak "government's" sinister intention to bring the south-north relations to collapse.
					
					 Strongly condemning the security authorities for trying to fake up outdated conspiratorial cases to destroy the progressive organizations, the statement declared that the solidarity would wage a more stubborn struggle to defend and implement the said declarations and bring earlier the peace and reunification of the Korean Peninsula, braving the security authorities' suppression.

articles.title: Parte Norte fustiga fuertemente a la Sur que viola el acuerdo military
articles.content:
Parte Norte fustiga fuertemente a la Sur que viola el acuerdo militar
Pyongyang, 2 de octubre (ATCC) -- En relacion con que se tornan cada dia mas graves los actos de violacion del acuerdo militar Norte-Sur por parte de la capa militar titere del Sur de Corea, tuvieron lugar el dia 2 las conversaciones de expertos militares en la parte surena de Phanmunjom.
					En esta cita participaron la delegacion norcoreana presidida por el coronel general del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Pak Rim Su. 
					
					En la ocasion la parte norcoreana fustigo en terminos fuertes al circulo militar titere del Sur de Corea que recurre a los perversos actos de lanzamiento de volantes contra la RPDC en contra del acuerdo bilateral.
					
					Revelo con datos el hecho de que ultimamente, el circulo militar surcoreano esparce muchos volantes en la region cercana a la Linea de Demarcacion Militar incluyendo las provincias de Kangwon y de Hwanghae del Sur y del Norte, la Zona Industrial de Kaesong y la Turistica del Monte Kumgang y su contorno y hasta en la parte centrica y las comunas de la ciudad de Kaesong.
					
					Tambien, aclaro que esta campana se torna mas grave que los tiempos anteriores.
					
					Asevero que esta sucia campana resulta una accion tan necia para aflojar la conviccion y la voluntad del ejercito y pueblo de la RPDC que aprecia mas que su vida a su lider y su patria. 
					
					Afirmo que esta sucia y virulenta guerra psicologica anti-RPDC centupulicara unicamente el odio del ejercito y pueblo de esta.
					
					La gravedad del lanzamiento de volantes es que esto deviene la flagrante violacion y desafio al acuerdo militar entre ambas partes y acto que empeora las actuales relaciones Norte-Sur ya agudas y tirantes, apunto.
					
					Y su caracter peligroso esta en que puede funcionar como la chispa de nuevos conflictos armados, revelo.
					
					Teniendo presente la gravedad de la situacion creada,  la parte norcoreana urgio fuertemente que la capa militar titere surcorena interrumpa de inmediato el lanzamiento de volantes, pida disculpas oficialmente por el respecto, castigue severamente a los culpables principales y entidades involucrados en esto y tome con responsabilidad estrictas medidas para prevenir la repeticion del caso segun el acuerdo militar bilateral.
					
					La parte surcoreana, en vez de reconocer sus actos de guerra psicologica anti-RPDC y pedir disculpas, intento eludir de todas maneras su responsabilidad hablando de la supuesta "situacion interna" y las "caracteristicas del sistema". 
					
					Pero, al no encontrar la escapatoria ante la razonable insistencia y las pruebas presentadas por la parte Norte, se vio obligada a tomar la posicion conciliatoria diciendo que investigaria el caso y tomaria las medidas correspondientes cuando regresara.
					
					La parte norcoreana advirtio severamente los siguientes puntos si la capa militar surcoreana sigue recurriendo en lo adelante al lanzamiento de volantes.
					
					Primero, se produciran graves consecuencias en todas las labores de cooperacion Norte-Sur en la Zona Industrial de Kaesong y el turismo en esta ciudad, que estan en marcha ahora.
					
					Segundo, no se realizara debidamente el acceso del personal surcoreano por la Linea de Demarcacion Militar.
					
					Tercero, no podran quedarse por mas tiempo los surcoreanos que permanecen en la Zona Industrial de Kaesong y la Zona Turistica del Monte Kumgang.

articles.title: Embajador nigeriano ofrece banquete por dia de independencia
articles.content:
Embajador nigeriano ofrece banquete por dia de independencia
Pyongyang, 2 de octubre (ATCC) -- Con motivo del aniversario 48 de la independencia de Nigeria, el embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica Federal de Nigeria en Corea, Yusuf Amuda Abubakar, ofrecio la vispera un banquete.
					 A la comida fueron invitados el canciller Pak Ui Chun, el presidente interino del Comite de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero Mun Jae Chol, el vicecanciller Kim Hyong Jun, el viceministro de Comercio Exterior Ri Myong San y otros funcionarios correspondientes y  representantes diplomaticos de varios paises en Corea.
					
					  Estuvieron presentes alli los miembros de la embajada nigeriana en Corea.
					
					  En la ocasion al hacer uso de la palabra el embajador nigeriano dijo que la Republica Federal de Nigeria y la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea han mantenido las relaciones bilaterales amistosas apoyandose y cooperando durante largo tiempo.
					
					  Prosiguio que se realizo en junio del 2000 el encuentro historico de Pyongyang entre ambas partes de Corea donde fue publicada la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y dijo que deseaba que se logre la reunificacion de Corea a base de esta declaracion.
					
					  Pak Ui Chun, en su discurso, senalo que Corea y Nigeria, paises no alineados, se han venido apoyando y cooperando desde hace mucho tiempo.
					
					  Subrayo que hara esfuerzos en el futuro tambien por desarrollar las relaciones entre los dos paises en varios dominios.

articles.title: Minju Joson comenta la nueva locura de la banda de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Minju Joson comenta la nueva locura de la banda de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 2 de octubre (ATCC) -- Las maniobras de enfrentamiento fratricida de la banda de Lee Myung Bak, que da espaldas a la nacion y vive como parasito pegado a EE.UU., devienen la locura para arruinarse como palomilla que se mete en el fuego.
					  Asi senala el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual del dia 2 y continua:
					
					 La banda de Lee se esfuerza desesperadamente por atacar por via militar junto con EE.UU. a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					 Una prueba contundente de ello es la "demostracion de las armas del fuego" desarrollada hace unos dias en Phochon de la provincia de Kyonggi.
					
					  Esta aventurera maniobra militar para ejercitar la agresion a la RPDC fue ideada por el dictador de "renovacion", antecesor del "Gran Partido Nacional".
					
					  Al volver a desarrollar este ejercicio que habia sido botado al basurero de la historia, los titeres surcoreanos se proponen a empeorar las relaciones Norte-Sur irritando al ejercito y pueblo de la RPDC.
					
					  De esta manera, quedo evidenciado de hecho que el "dialogo", la "confianza" y la "sinceridad", de que habla Lee, no pasan de ser el falso cartel politico para ganarse la simpatia del pueblo, eludir la  responsabilidad de haber llevado a la peor fase las relaciones con el Norte y esquivar la critica de los habitantes indignados.
					
					  La verdadera intencion de Lee es atacar con las fuerzas armadas a los connacionales.
					
					  En este tipejo sucio y repugnante, que actua con doble alma, no se puede confiar ni tratar.  
					
					  La banda de Lee debe actuar con prudencia teniendo en clara cuenta que el servilismo a EE.UU. y el enfrentamiento fratricida son el camino de autodestruccion.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun senala la independencia nacional
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun senala la independencia nacional
Pyongyang, 2 de octubre (ATCC) -- Resolver de modo independiente entre nosotros, los connacionales el problema de la nacion, el de la reunificacion del pais rechazando estrictamente a la intervencion extranjera  es la unanime aspiracion de toda la nacion coreana y la demanda fundamental de la epoca de la reunificacion  del 15 de Junio.
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en el comentario individual de este jueves y continua:
					
					La independencia nacional deviene la base de la solucion del problema nacional y la linea de vida del movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					La nacion coreana experimento profundamente a traves de la historia de martirios  el destino de la nacion que carece de la independencia.
					
					Hoy dia, la realidad del movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria demanda a la nacion coreana que levante  en alto la bandera de la independencia nacional.
					
					EE.UU., al disgustarse  de la ejecucion de la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre crea el ambiente para obstaculizar la ejecucion de tales declaraciones, mediante la agravacion de la confrontacion y la tension en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Bajo la instigacion de EE.UU., la banda de Lee Muyng Bak del Sur de Corea desacredita a las declaraciones Norte- Sur que apoya y aplaude toda la nacion coreana y se oponen a  su ejecucion, reprime cruelmente las entidades y los habitantes patrioticos por la reunificacion en virtud de la "Ley de Seguridad" e impide el movimiento libre por la causa nacional.
					
					En la condicion de que se tornan cada dia mas perversas las maquinaciones de las fuerzas extranjeras y las fuerzas surcoreanas anti-reunificacion que intentan obstaculizar la reconciliacion y la reunificacion de la nacion y fomentar la confrontacion entre el Norte y el Sur, la nacion coreana debe tomar firmemente la independencia nacional por la linea de vida y mantener la soberania para que logre la causa de la reunificacion de la patria y abra plenamente el camino del desarrollo y la prosperidad.
					
					La historia y la realidad muestran que el problema de la reunificacion del pais debe ser  resuelto sin falta entre nosotros, los connacionales en el principio de la independencia nacional.
					
					El verdadero patriotismo de la epoca de la reunificacion del 15 de Junio es apoyar y defender activamente el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales", esencia del espiritu de la independencia nacional, y vivir y luchar de acuerdo con su demanda.
